article_title: Chinese Shipping Operators Missing Out on Global Trade Rebound
article_text:
HONG KONG—Chinese shipping operators keep struggling in spite of the global trade rebound, weighed down by excess shipping capacity and operating inefficiencies.

China Cosco Holdings Co. and China Shipping Container Lines Co., two of the country's biggest shipping operators, posted weak results on Thursday, with soft freight rates and high costs continuing to plague the companies, in contrast to strict cost controls that have buoyed...
